I met her sooner than I expected...
...The one I'm destined to be with.
@exp Rigurd.Smile.Idle:The materials are all ready, the detailed plan is worked out... Now all I have to do is assign all the tasks, Great Rimuru!
Rigurd, can I talk to you about something? This plan you've come up with...
Notice: Large number of magical beasts approaching. Risk of incursion into town.
What?! Did they get past our guard?!
Rigurd, help everyone take cover! I'll go take care of this!
@exp Hakuro.Smile.Exclusive_1: I'm just a tired old man, but I'll lift my arms to help you if you need anything done.
@exp Hakuro.Sad.Exclusive_1: Souei is an excellent worker, but doesn't know how to blow off steam all that well. Look after him from time to time, will ya?
@exp Ranga.Angry.Exclusive_1: I smelled an unfamiliar monster outside the town. Should I go bite it?
Whew. Good thing I defeated that thing before it did any damage.
@exp Geld.Smile.Exclusive_1:Indeed, thank you Great Rimuru! Now we can concentrate on the construction work!
When all the others hear that Great Rimuru defeated the beast himself, they'll work so hard, they'll even stop taking breaks to sleep!
Huh? No, don't do that! Make sure everyone takes breaks. We don't want anyone collapsing from sleep deprivation!
@exp GazelDwargo.Smile.Exclusive_1: People of different races live together in this nation. It's a stimulating experience just to engage in conversation...
@exp GazelDwargo.Normal.Exclusive_1: This town is starting to draw a lot of people, but it's still got a ways to go. Keep working at it.
I'll shake you to pieces. String Quake Cannon!
Answer: Abilities of target individual can be unlocked.
@exp Kaijin.Smile.Idle:Rimuru! I made a trial version of the sword for King Gazel!
@exp Kaijin.Smile.Exclusive_1:It wasn't easy, I can tell you that! Now, I'd like to test it out. Would  you mind trying it out for me?
@exp Hakuro.Smile.Exclusive_1: Everyone here, starting with Princess Shuna, has found a job they're good at and is living life to the fullest. I was a bit worried at first, but now I am content.
I wouldn't have been able to do it without all of you. I'd especially like to give Shuna and Kurobe awards for technological advancement.
@exp Kurobei.Smile.Exclusive_1: I'm eternally thankful for the name you gave me.
@exp Shion.Grin.Idle: Princess Shuna and I are going to design an outfit together for you to wear, Great Rimuru!
Well... Put simply, it's a monster.
That's simple, all right. We're all monsters.
It's said that a unique monster is born to the Orcs every few centuries.
They say he devours even his own allies' fear, which makes him an unnaturally effective leader.
The Orcs that attacked our village were unfazed by the deaths of their own, so I thought that may be the case.
Of course, the possibility of it is quite low.
Any other ideas why they might have attacked your village?
Well... I'm not sure if there's any connection, but shortly before the attack, a majin visited our village.
He said that, but he sounded too untrustworthy, so I turned him away, and he cursed me as he left.
A majin, huh? So you think he might have a grudge against you?
I had no other choice. I want no such gift from an unsuitable master. I wouldn't accept a name from just anyone, after all.
What was his name again? I think he said... Gela... Geli... Gele... Gelo?
Gelmud? I think I've heard that name before... Ah!
Rigur, who gave your brother his name?
Sir! I'm told he received his name from a passing Demon called Lord Gelmud. He saw promise in him.
Gelmud. He's an officer in the Demon Lord's army. But my brother didn't change as much as we have.
I bet it's the same guy. Does he just go around naming whoever? Why?
I bring a report, Great Rimuru.
I witnessed a group of Lizardmen.
Correct. Because they make the marshlands their home, it seemed unnatural to see them near here, so I had to inform you at once.
They seemed to be attempting negotiations with a nearby Goblin village. They may one day come here, as well.
Lizardmen... What are they like, I wonder?
Visit the local Goblin villages and enlist their aid.
Indeed! It is not the way of the proud Lizardman race to fear mere Orcs!
And he used to be such a great man...
Hey, Sir Gabiru, when are you gonna become the chieftain?
Oh, no. My comment may have been a bit disrespectful, but I still fall far short of my father.
Really? But as you are now, I bet you're just as mighty as the chieftain during his glory days!
I mean, you're named, after all!
Yes, and you are unequaled in the art of the spear.
If you don't take your stand now, when will you?
Eh? What is this? Could it be...that I'm actually pretty great?!
Hmph, yes. You are right. My father has grown old. Even if I must be a bit forceful, I will show him that I have strength worthy of a chieftain!
Then he can retire with peace of mind.
Yes! Once I drive away the Orc army, I will take my place as the next Lizardman chieftain!
Follow me, men! Your future is bright!
@exp Shuna.Puzzle.Exclusive_1: If you're looking for my brother, he went off somewhere wearing a frayed coat again...
Kenya Misaki. Ryota Sekiguchi. Gale Gibson. Alice Rondo. Chloe Aubert.
All right now, I waited ten seconds, and yet none of you answered me. So listen up... When your name is called, respond loudly and clearly!
Right, right, I understand. Okay, I'm going to call in a friend of mine.
I am Ranga. Let's behave, kid.
Excellent. Looks like you're good friends already. That's great. I'm not as nice as Miss Shizu. Just keep that in mind!
Looks like it won't be easy to gain their trust... Well, I can't blame them. They were summoned into this world and then tossed aside.
Okay! Looks like you all have something you want to say, but before that, are you all ready for a test?
Hey! Why do we have to do that?
It's too soon for a test! I demand an explanation!
Now, just relax. This test is one that you kids need right now.
Why?! We're just gonna die sooner or later, anyway! What's the point in studying?!
Th-That's right... Our other teachers just gave us toys and picture books, and said we could play as much as we wanted...
We haven't studied at all since we came here.
I want to read picture books more...
Who do you think you are, anyway?! Thinking you can do whatever you want just 'cuz of that kinda scary dog you've got there!
Yes, yes. It's good to have so much energy. Don't worry. I called it a test, but it's a fun game.
It'll give you children...I mean, you guys a chance to vent your frustrations.
You will each fight a one-on-one mock battle with me. The rules are simple. Feel free to attack me with everything you've got.
If you can defeat me, you win. But if I can evade you for ten minutes, I win. Easy enough?
Or an hour, if you'd prefer.
Hah! So long as you don't sic that dog on us, we won't even need ten minutes!
I can promise you I won't do that. Ranga, don't interfere.
Hehe, I'll definitely win if you don't use that dog!
I want to read my picture book...
Kenya Misaki, you can go first.
Use whatever you want. But if you lose, you have to start showing me some respect!
Hah! No adult can beat us. I've never lost to anyone but Miss Shizu!
Save the big talk for after you beat me.
Now... Will making them fight with all their power burn up some of the excess magicule energy that'll otherwise destroy him someday?
You move pretty well, but you've got a ways to go!
It's good that he can use magic, but these flames actually seem pretty weak... Relative to the amount of energy within him, it's really inefficient.
Hey! Instead of relying on your flames, try just striking with raw energy.
Shut up! The techniques Miss Shizu used were awesome! I don't care what you say!
@exp Shuna.Smile.Exclusive_1: As more and more people start to live here, making clothes for them all is getting to be a lot of work. Thankfully, it's fun! Hehee!
@exp Soei.Cool.Exclusive_1: We'll have to strengthen the watch system to match the larger scale of the town.
@exp Geld.Smile.Exclusive_1: Great Rimuru! I would like to express my effusive appreciation for—
Still too formal! It was nothing!
@exp Izis.Smile.Exclusive_1:Charybdis! I almost forgot about that! The monster Rimuru couldn't defeat on his own! If Milim hadn't been there that time...
@exp Phobio.Sad.Idle:Oh, right... I remember being clobbered by Lord Carrion. But after that, my memory is completely gone.
@exp Phobio.None.Exclusive_1:Pitiful... I know I felt very pitiful, definitely.
@exp Phobio.Angry.Idle:I fell for what those clowns were saying. I couldn't tame Charybdis. Lord Carrion is so close, yet so far away.
That dream could come true, you know?
@exp Phobio.Surprise.Think:And, oh yeah... I saw someone reflected in the blood I spilled. They started to talk. That's all I remember.
@exp Rimuru.Normal.Think:The students' magicules are stable at the moment. It should be alright now, but it probably hasn't sunk in for them yet, so they must be worried.
@exp Rimuru.Bitter.Idle:The other day it was hot chocolate, but tonight, maybe I'll make some cocoa.
@exp Rimuru.Surprise.Surprise:Yikes, what the heck?! The cocoa's glowing! Enchanted cocoa?!
@exp Rimuru.Cool.Think:Where's the cocoa? ...Just kidding. Which parallel world is it this time?
Hey... I've been waiting for you, Rimuru... Rimuru Tempest.
Those clothes... Phobio? Is that you?
I'm Phobio, the Blue Sky Fang... I'm different from the Black Fang who dominates the earth. Everything under the sky and upon the earth is now a part of my hunting grounds!
Notice: Phobio has seized the internal Charybdis and is completing his evolution to Demon Lord.
Demon Lord?! So he... That Charybdis? So it's come to that?! I know you're there, Izis! You're behind this too, aren't you?! Show yourself!
Don't be such a boor, Rimuru. It's just you and me right now. Izis has nothing to do with this.
I don't think so. You're being controlled by Izis in a bid to kill me.
I'm nothing like the former me. No way I'd keep allowing myself to be used. All I want to do is fight you, and that's it!
Whoa! This is bad. I can talk to him, but if he wants to fight there's no way to talk him into backing down.
It's not that I'm ungrateful for your helping me. But that only makes me want to surpass you even more. If I don't, I'll never be on par with Lord Carrion!
You really are fixing for a fight. Okay then, bring it on!
Haha, that's it! The skill that saved me! Do that again! I won't try to dodge it or block it!
Aren't we confident? Don't blame me if you're annihilated. Here you go! Another helping of Gluttony!
Haha, lost your appetite this time?
@exp Rimuru.Cool.Sigh:Magic Jamming? I couldn't eat all of Charybdis that time, either.
@exp Rimuru.Impatience.Idle:But things were different then. The corrosive effect worked on Charybdis, but it didn't do a thing to him.
@exp Rimuru.Sad.Sad:And Milim isn't here, either. This is looking really bad.
@exp PhobioAnother_C.Angry.Angry:Now it's my turn. My bad if I end up killing you!
You and I should go drinking sometime.
@exp Rigurd.Grin.Exclusive_1:Oh, thank you! I'm so happy! I humbly accept!
Great Rimuru, we have an emergency.
Wow, there are flying horses in this world?!
Several hundred pegasus-mounted knights are heading this way.
It sounds like a losing battle. I'd rather avoid fighting if possible...
It's no problem. We can just knock them all away.
Whoa, whoa... If it comes down to a fight, evacuate the townsfolk. We'll buy time until then.
King Gazel, it is a pleasure to see you again.
It's been a long time, Kaijin. And you as well...slime. Do you remember me?
Bwahahahaha! No need to be so nervous! I've come here today as a mere private citizen, after all.
Of course that's a pretense, but I wouldn't be able to walk around freely in any other way.
Then I'll introduce myself first. My name is Rimuru. I'm a slime, but I'd rather you didn't call me that.
I am the chancellor of the Jura Forest Alliance, after all. So...why are you here?
I'll get right to the point. Rimuru, I've come to see what you truly are.
I will expose your true nature with my sword!
Since you boasted of being the chancellor of this forest, it seems I must teach you exactly where you stand!
If that sword is more than mere decoration, you would do well to accept my proposal.
An earnest battle is the quickest way to settle this, is it not?
All right, then. I accept. I'll make you regret accusing me of boasting.
I will serve as witness to this contest!
You should not be so rude to the chancellor of our forest, Dwarf King.
By accusing Chancellor Rimuru of boasting, you are making enemies of the citizens of this forest. Are you prepared to face the consequences for this insult?
Bwahahahaha! You've got the Dryads on your side! The sovereigns of the forest themselves... In that case, I willingly apologize for accusing you of boasting.
I have a vague understanding of the circumstances now!
But that is a separate matter from judging your true nature.
Now that we have a witness, all that remains is to cross swords!
Yeah, I guess so. I'll win this in no time and make you explain what's going on here.
Hah! If you manage to defeat me, you will have your answer!
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.Normal.Idle: Now that they've joined us, we'll have to build houses for you and your Tempest Wolves too, Ranga.
Master, we've always just lived in the wilderness before. You don't need to worry about us.
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.Normal.Think: No, that won't do, will it? You're citizens too, you know. You belong here.
@exp RangaDefault.Grin.Joy: Ah! Such kind words! Master, to my dying day, I will never forget the consideration you have just shown us!
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.Normal.Shy: All right, no need to blow things out of proportion...
Milim! Mind running a little errand for me?
@exp Milim.Grin.Exclusive_1:You're asking the Demon Lord Milim to...run an errand? Tee-heehee, you're funny! Just hilarious!
Doesn't it get old, taking care of me day after day?
@exp Shion.Smile.Exclusive_1:Not at all! In fact, it's fun!
Yes, a merchant named Mjolmire is quite keen on inviting you to the store he runs.
He said the children can come along, too.
And why is this guy inviting me?
He said a mysterious warrior saved his life today. It was you who defeated the Sky Dragon, wasn't it?
Was it, now? So, this...Mjolmire guy, is he trustworthy?
He has earned the official merchant certification issued by the Kingdom of Blumund and the Free Union.
Of course, he also works as a loan shark out of the public eye...but I ran a background check on him. He can be trusted.
Hmm... I'll see what he wants!
Hey, that's my piece of meat!
Heh, don't worry, there's so much of it...
Of course it is! I procured that via a particularly special route! Go on, don't hold back! Drink up.
You're sure you don't mind feeding my students, too?
Not at all, not at all! I owe you my life, after all!
I get information from all over the place, you know. Even with a different appearance, I know very well that was you.
And I must show my gratitude to my savior or incur Heaven's wrath!
So, shall we say that we're even now?
I get it. This guy seems trustworthy enough as a merchant.
By the way, Mjolmire, with that information network of yours, you must know who I am, right?
Then why don't you come to our town? I'll write you a letter of introduction.
We intend to sell all kinds of things, but we lack the know-how. If we had your help...
So we would both profit...I mean, benefit! Ah, hahahahaha! Very well. You and I are friends, after all!
Right... I have the invitation to your town. Come visit me again. I'll cut some great deals just for you!
May the blessing of the Queen of Spirits safeguard these children.
It's a prayer we say in my homeland. It means the Queen of Spirits, who lives in the Dwelling of Spirits, will protect you.
Excuse me, miss! Did you just say the Dwelling of Spirits? Do you know where that is?
Huh? Yes, I do... I come from a village near there.
In exchange for a handsome tip, the lady told me where to go...
The Ulg Nature Park, in the northern part of a frontier nation called the Republic of Ulgrasia. That's the place, apparently.
So this is where the Dwelling of Spirits is... Shizu, I swear I'm going to save these kids!
Huh? You're back already? I gathered the stuff as fast as I could...
@exp Shion.Smile.Idle:Hehehe, I told you I've been training! I had to run around a lot while chasing all those monsters.
Notice: Confirmed. Shion's aura is more powerful than before.
Looks like you really did train a lot. Well, I don't want to overlook all of your hard work. Let's compare strength sometime.
@exp Shion.Grin.Exclusive_1:Really?! You promised! I won't forget you said that, Great Rimuru!
@exp RimuruDefault.Cool.Relax: We've got honey and other sweeteners now, and Shuna's cooking is better than ever...
@exp RimuruDefault.Normal.Proposal: The time has come to execute a new strategy, Rigurd!
@exp RigurdDefault.Puzzle.Think: Um... What do you mean, Great Rimuru?
@exp RimuruDefault.Smile.Angry: Sweetness captures the heart! So let's make a café that caters to travelers!
@exp Geld.Smile.Exclusive_1: Contributing to the growth of this town is the ultimate joy.
Great Sage, please tell me what to do now.
Answer: Explaining actions that are currently recommended.
Back when I was still alive, I was stabbed by a random attacker...
And wouldn't you know it! I got reincarnated as a slime!
Ever since then, I've learned about the Great Sage, Predator, and all sorts of other things. I'll spare you the details for now.
Basically, I was reincarnated with the ability to use some really handy skills. Just as I figured I might be able to survive here in this strange world...
Can you hear me, small one? Answer me!
I wandered into a place where a seriously powerful-looking dragon had been sealed away as a prisoner.
Allow me to formally introduce myself. I am the Storm Dragon, Veldora.
I am one of only four True Dragons that exist in this world! Hah, hahaha, hahahahahaaah!
By the way, you are indeed an unusual slime... Slimes are normally low-ranked monsters that don't think, but you have self-awareness. Are you Unique?
I'm not really sure. The thing is, I used to be a human, but I got stabbed and died, and next thing I knew, I looked like this.
I see. You were reincarnated. You came into this world in a very unusual way.
(I felt pretty damn lonely just because I never had a girlfriend in 37 years... I can't imagine being all alone for 300 years.)
Okay! Why don't you and I be friends?
What?! A mere slime proposes friendship with me, the feared Storm Dragon?!
If you don't want to, I understand...
Fool! No one said I didn't want to!
Uh, really? Then...what do you say?
Yes, well... If you insist... I guess I'm willing to think about it.
Yes, I insist! So that settles it! If you refuse, we're through! I'll never come here again!
W-Well, all right. I'll be your friend. You'd better be grateful!
Just can't be honest, can you? Well, glad to know ya!
It's a little embarrassing talking about friends at my age...
So, what do we do? About the Unlimited Imprisonment seal that hero put on you. I feel bad knowing my friend's been sealed here for 300 years.
...Ah, hahahahahahahaaah!!! That sounds interesting! Please, do it! I'll entrust my entirety to you!
Okay, I'll use Predator to eat you—
Oh and, before we start, I'll give you a name. Let's think of a name we could share. It will engrave onto our souls the fact that we are equals.
A shared name... You mean like a family name. You're the Storm Dragon... Storm... Another word for storm?
What do you think of Tempest? Too cheesy?
As of today, I am Veldora Tempest! And I will grant you the name—
Rimuru! You will be Rimuru Tempest!
All right, please do it, my friend.
I might be attacked by monsters during my travels.
It swallowed up that Storm Dragon? That's no ordinary slime... An interesting key has been discovered...
But wait... This is nothing compared to Veldora, is it? If I use Predator to eat this snake and analyze it, wouldn't I be able to take its abilities?
Blech! I can't taste things, but still! Blech!
Analysis complete. Multiple skills acquired. Mimicry of consumed magical beast now possible.
Man, Predator sure is useful! All right! I'm gonna acquire a lot more skills!
I'm not the only one who has come here from another world. Even so, it's not normal to be reincarnated the way I was.
Veldora had actually been sealed here for 300 years by a Hero who was what is known as a Summon, someone forced to come to this world. She used the skill Unlimited Imprisonment.
Based on Great Sage's analysis of the seal...
I decided to store Veldora in my belly, Unlimited Imprisonment seal and all! Then Great Sage could continue analyzing it from the outside while Veldora helps from the inside.
In other words, I told Veldora that if he let me eat him, I could investigate his situation. I know it's a tall order, but that's all I had.
A great tremor rocked the world on this day. The disappearance of the Storm Dragon Veldora, a Catastrophe- class monster, was confirmed.
And one slime, completely ignorant of the events it had set in motion...
I know it's not much, but I'll do whatever I can to make this town even better than it already is.
@exp Vesta.Sad.Exclusive_1:It's difficult, teaching people things. How do you explain something in an easy-to-understand manner?
Souei, you always come right away when I call. Are you getting enough rest?
@exp Soei.Bitter.Exclusive_1:Yes, sometimes I just use Body Doubles while I take a break.
@exp Geld.Normal.Exclusive_1: A town that accepts anyone, without discrimination... It's all due to the compassion of this town, and it starts with its leader.
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.None.Think:You want to erect a statue of Veldora here in the town? Why's that, Rigurd?
@exp RigurdDefault.Cool.Proposal:As you know, the Great Forest of Jura used to be under the guardianship of the Storm Dragon Veldora.
@exp RigurdDefault.None.Think: Perhaps if we honor the Storm Dragon in this way, we will receive his divine protection once more in return!
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.None.Relax:(I see. Veldora was an important part of this forest, and I bet he'll be happy to have his own statue...)
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.None.Exclusive_1:All right, Rigurd! I give you my permission. Start the actual work!
@exp Kaijin.Normal.Idle:Hullo there, Rimuru. Congratulations are in order today, eh?
Oh? How did you know that, Kaijin?
Haha, well, you hear things when you live in this town. Here, this is for you. In commemoration of the happy occasion.
What in the world is this?! I've never had anything so delicious!
Hehehe, what's wrong, Demon Lord Milim? If you'll admit defeat to me now, I'd be willing to give you this, too.
(It's honey I found and ate in the forest.)
I want it! But to admit defeat...
Whoops, looks like I'm running low now.
Wait, I have a proposal! A draw! Why don't we call it a draw this time?!
And if I agree to this proposal? What conditions can you offer?
We'll forget all of this happened!
Of course, that's not all! I'll swear never to mess with any of you ever again!
(I win! Her power is overwhelming, but she's as much a child on the inside as she is on the outside. She's no match for my sneaky adult negotiating tactics.)
Very well. I'll accept your terms. We'll call it a draw this time.
It's so good! This is so good!
(I wish she'd just leave before this gets any more out of hand...)
Hey... Don't you ever think of becoming a Demon Lord?
Why should I put myself through that kind of hassle?
Huh? But you'd be a Demon Lord! Aren't they awesome? Doesn't everyone want to be one?
Does something good happen when you become a Demon Lord?
Strong opponents come from all over to fight you. It's fun!
I get plenty of that already. Not interested.
What?! Then what do you even enjoy in life?
All kinds of things. I've got a lot to do. It's crazy. Is there anything fun about being a Demon Lord besides fighting?
Well, no... But you get to boss Majin and Humans around!
Doesn't that just mean you're bored?
Well, I should head back. Take care going home.
Wait! You're doing something more fun than being a Demon Lord, aren't you?
No fair! No fair! No fair! Now I'm mad!
I don't know what you want me to—
Tell me what it is! And then let me join you! Take me to your village!
Temper tantrums now?! Fine, fine. But I have one condition. From now on, you'll call me Great Rimuru.
Screw that! You should address me with respect! You will call me Great Milim!
Okay, let's do this. I'll call you Milim, and you can call me Rimuru.
Fine... But just you and no one else! And you should thank me for this honor! The only ones I allow to call me Milim are my fellow Demon Lords.
Right, right. Thanks a lot. So I guess we're friends from now on.
All right, I'll show you my village now, but no causing any commotion without my permission. Promise me, Milim.
Leave it to Great Rimuru to tame the Demon Lord Milim so easily...
That's to be expected of Great Rimuru!
I shall go and inform Rigurd at once. It would not do to have someone accidentally anger the Demon Lord.
And who is this little runt?
Who are you calling a runt? You wanna be murdered?
(I just told her not to cause any commotion...)
Listen up! I'm in a very good mood right now! That's why I'm letting you off the hook! It won't happen again, so watch your step!
Pshaw! I just saw my dearly departed father waving at me from across the river...
You really have no idea who you're dealing with, do you? And your father's alive, dork.
Oh yeah. How thoughtless of me. But who is this little— I mean...this young lady?
This is Milim. She's a Demon Lord, apparently.
Listen, Milim, you can't just slug someone right away when you get mad.
Hmph! It's his fault for making me mad. Besides, that was just my way of saying hello!
Slugging people is not saying hello. No more of that.
Allow me to introduce our new ally. We'll be treating her as a guest, so be courteous with her.
Wow! This is my first time seeing her!
He befriended a tyrant like her... This means Tempest can exist in peace.
(So Milim is famous? Everyone's surprisingly okay with this...)
I've decided to live here from now on! Nice to know you!
What do you mean, live here?
Exactly what I said. I've decided to live here, too!
Uh... Well, you heard her, so treat her as you would any other.
Friends with a Demon Lord, huh?
You're right. Calling us friends is a little weird.
Let me think... Rather than friends...we're besties!
We're besties! We're besties! Everyone! We're besties!
There, see? You're so good at surprising people!
Whoa... What is this? It feels fantastic!
Myrd of the three Dwarf brothers designed it for me. It's my pride and joy, a hot spring constructed out of marble.
Amazing! You can swim in here!
(Right, well... I just casually joined in, but I think I'm ready...)
I never imagined a Demon Lord would take the initiative in coming here.
Yeah, but she did promise not to cause any commotion without my permission. It should be fine, right?
Yes, but...what's more concerning is what the other Demon Lords will do.
Well, there are several Demon Lords. They're always keeping each other in check.
Your declaration that Lady Milim is our friend means this village is now under her protection.
Under normal circumstances, that might be a good thing, but...

Great Rimuru, you hold the position of chancellor of the Jura Tempest Federation. In other words, it will appear to the other Demon Lords that the Great Forest of Jura has forged an alliance with the Demon Lord Milim.
The Demon Lord Milim will instantly gain more influence, upsetting the balance among the Demon Lords.
When this happens...if we make the wrong move, the entire forest could go up in the flames of war.
But in reality, there is no way we could stop the Demon Lord Milim.
Her strength was on a completely different level. There was never any question of us stopping her. If not for Great Rimuru, we wouldn't be alive right now.
Precisely. If the other Demon Lords become hostile, would we not have a better chance against them? Milim is definitely a real Catastrophe-class Demon Lord.
On that note... We shall entrust everything to Great Rimuru, the one she has deemed her bestie! No objections, I'm assuming?
What? You dumped it all on me?!
Lady Milim is one of the oldest and most powerful of all Demon Lords. She is known as a Demon Lord that everyone should avoid making an enemy of.
This is one of those situations where we really have no choice but to entrust everything to Great Rimuru. Hohohohooo...
And that's how we overcame this unprecedented Catastrophe.
I guess there's no choice...or so I thought. But we didn't know that the whirlwind Milim would stir up...
@exp Milim.Grin.Exclusive_1: Shuna's cooking, Shuna's cooking! I feel like meat today.

Notice: Its attributes are Water and Wind. Creation of artificial superior spirit of water and wind successful. Unify it with Ryota Sekiguchi?

Chairman Rimuru Tempest, please begin the conference.
(So I'm the chairman now? Says who? I have no idea how to decide what happens next!)
(Ah well, not much I can do about this. Guess I'll just tell them what I think, such as it is...)
Uh... I've never led a meeting like this before, so it's not my strong suit. So I'll just say what's on my mind. I'd like you to save your deliberations until after that.
I'll start by saying this: I don't intend to charge the Orcs with any crimes.
I know this may upset the Lizardmen, who suffered the most casualties, but hear me out.
Acts of aggression are wrong, but the cause of all this was starvation due to a famine. Anyone, of any race, might have made the same choices under those conditions.
Of course, this is just my public stance on the matter.
Then may we hear your personal thoughts on it, as well?
I've taken all of the Orcs' sins upon myself. If anyone has a complaint, bring it to me.
P-Please, wait! Surely there is no logic to—
That was my promise with the Demon Lord Geld.
I see. However, I feel that answer is somewhat unfair.
(Yeah, I can see why you wouldn't accept it so easily.)
There is one immutable rule shared among all monsters: Survival of the fittest. The moment they faced each other, they were both prepared for that.
You guys lost your home, too. Don't you have any complaints?
I would be lying if I said we didn't, but if it happens again, we will not disgrace ourselves a second time.
I see... That is a fair point. As Lizardmen, it would be beneath our dignity to object to what you just said. But there is one thing I must know.
What will be done with the Orcs?
You have said you will not charge them with any crimes. Does that mean you intend to accept all of their survivors?
Good point. Even with their numbers down, there are still 150,000 of them. That being the case...
It may sound like some kind of dream, but I'm thinking we can all work together.
The Lizardmen will share a clean water source and fish, the Goblins will offer places to live, and our town will give them processed goods.
And in return, the Orcs will contribute labor.
All the races of the Great Forest of Jura will form an alliance and build a mutually cooperative relationship. It'd be really cool if we could create a nation where all races could coexist!
A-And you're saying we could also take part in this alliance?
Well, you have nowhere else to go, do you? I have a place for you, so do some work.
Yes, sir! Of course! Of course we will! We will devote our lives to our work!
We would be honored to join forces with you.
Treyni, is that okay with you?
Certainly. The Treants under my protection will share the bounty of the forest, as well.
I believe we can alleviate the Orcs' hunger for some time.
Then...as a caretaker of the forest, I, Treyni, hereby pledge to acknowledge Great Rimuru as the new chancellor of the Great Forest of Jura...
...and declare the Jura Forest Alliance to be established under Chancellor Rimuru!
(Somehow I just ended up the chancellor of the alliance... Not Treyni?!)
(And declining really doesn't seem like an option right now... F-Fine, I will! I'll do it!)
Okay, um... I guess that's how it's gonna be, so I'm counting on all of you!
My least favorite kind of work... That's right, discussions about what will happen after the battle...
And thus, while I was left in an uncontrollable cold sweat, the Jura Forest Alliance was established...

Of course, we won't say anything bad about this place.

If anything comes up, you can always send for us.
There's one last favor we'd like to ask...
Could you take your human form again?

I'll strive to be the kind of leader you won't have to worry about!
My time adventuring with you will be my life's treasure!
Thank you! You were like a big sister to me!

Wait! What the heck is this robe?! It's light, but sturdy...and it's so pretty!
Whoa! It's the scale mail I've always wanted!

K-Kaijin?! Are you serious?! From Dwargon?!
And Garm, Myrd and Dord... The three Dwarf brothers?!
I'll make it my family heirloom! Wow!
I hope you're ready. I'll find you no matter what...and smash your face in.
I will give you a name and some food.
Gelmud. You can think of me as your father. Your name is Geld.
One day you will take possession of the Great Forest of Jura, and become the Orc Disaster.
Shizu's last request was about her students. The kids I saw when I had my fortune told.
But I don't know where they are. I guess this would be a perfect job for the Guild.
I'm glad Shizu's last travel companions happened to be these three.
After raising a fuss big enough to blow their sadness away, they left. They're so strong and resilient. I should learn from them.
The man who summoned Shizu. The Demon Lord who made her suffer.—
@exp Benimaru.Bitter.Exclusive_1: What do you think about this? I'm just not used to this look...
@exp Geld.Smile.Exclusive_1: This is perfect for me. Thank you so much!
We're so lucky to have you, Great Rimuru!
You shouldn't be too bad in a fight either, I might add.
@exp Rigurd.Sad.Idle:Great Rimuru... My deepest apologies... I have blundered!

@exp Rigurd.Cool.Exclusive_1:Nothing's too much! We must build a town square worthy of Great Rimuru's statue and monument!
@exp Rigurd.Angry.Idle:Please, can you help once again? Please! Please, I must have the materials for building a town square!

@exp GazelDwargo.Cool.Exclusive_1:Of course! I'd never have someone useless working for me.

Answer: Insufficient materials to enhance battle skills of individual {0} {1} in troop.
Acquisition of {2} recommended.
@exp Vesta.Smile.Idle:Amazing. You've brought back such high-quality materials... Great Rimuru, you have my thanks!
@exp Vesta.Smile.Exclusive_1:Now I can finally build my movable framework! All the problems have been solved!
(Huh? What did he say? Movable framework? What the heck is Vesta making, for real?)
The stonecutters could use some more help. I'll send a few more workers over...
@exp Kaijin.Sad.Idle:Rimuru, I'm sorry for asking you again and again, but...would you mind gathering some more materials, please?

Haha, don't worry about a thing! I said I'd help out, didn't I? Let's make a perfect sword, with all the best materials and no compromises!
What should I get for you this time?

I'm only able to continue my research here because of King Gazel's thoughtfulness and your compassion, Great Rimuru...
@exp Soei.Smile.Exclusive_1:Impressive work, Great Rimuru. Only you could build the town into something this magnificent.
Hehehe, my goal is something much bigger than this!
What's going to be important now is food, shelter, and clothing. We should form teams to hunt for food, build houses, and strengthen the village defenses.
We'll start with...having everyone form pairs. Hey, what are all of your names, anyway?
We monsters do not normally have names. Even without names, we can still communicate our thoughts to one another.
Oh, really? But it's more convenient to have names, so I'd like to name you all. Is that okay?
Wow! You're really gonna give us names?!
Why are you so excited over something as simple as getting a name? Okay, we'll start with the village elder.
What did you call the son you had who died in battle?
Rigur, huh? Then as his father and elder of this village, you'll be Rigurd!
Thank you so much! Rigurd! I am so moved!
Really? All right, as for you... You'll inherit your brother's name: Rigur.
You're Gobchi, that one over there is Gobtsu, and you...are Gobte. And you're Gobzo.
Um... We truly do appreciate you giving us all names, but...
We are aware that your magical power is immense, but are you sure it's all right to give all of us names at once?
Well, I don't see any problem.
He's the son of the Direwolf boss, isn't he? I wonder if he holds a grudge against me. It was my fault that he lost his father, after all...
I know. I'll give him my family name! Tempest...fang... Storm Fang... You'll be Ranga!
Oh, I think he likes it...likes it...urgh!
Warning: Internal magicule reserves have fallen below the minimum limit. Entering sleep mode.
I used up too many magicules? How...?
It must have been because he named so many of us at once...
Giving names to monsters uses up magicules? Is that why you were so worried, Rigurd?
Huh? He can't hear me... I can't even use my Magic Sense, or see anything, or talk?
Estimated time to full recovery: three days.
Just because I named some monsters?! And I won't even be able to move the whole time?!
What should I do...? What if they figure out how careless I was in giving them those names? Or if something attacks while I'm unconscious?!
Nah... I'm overthinking things. Everyone seemed to like their names, anyway.
And I may not be able to see anything, but I don't feel anything attacking me... Wait, what was that? Something did touch me?
This feels like...something's wiping me?! Someone's wiping my slime body down!
I was imagining all sorts of terrible things, but this...this makes me feel pretty happy.
Although there were problems, like how I used up all of my magicules, I was able to begin my life in the Goblin Village.
As for life in this other world... Well, I'll find a way to deal with it!
@exp Geld.Normal.Exclusive_1: リGreat Rimuru, your town...no, our town has grown into something marvelous. I wonder if my father Geld is looking down on this...

@exp Shuna.Grin.Exclusive_1:Thank you so much, Great Rimuru. You've been an incredible help. Well done.

I'll attack you for real... Don't hold it against me if you die.

Shall I show you your ideal form?

@exp Shuna.Smile.Exclusive_1: That loom Sir Kaijin made for me is really helping. I'll have to thank him again, teeheehee!

@exp Geld.Angry.Exclusive_1: For Great Rimuru, and for my dear departed father, Geld. We dedicate our lives to this nation of Tempest.

Notice: Pack of magical beasts detected just outside the town.

Those detestable pigs overran our village!
Yes, the same type of full plate mail that Humans wear.

Orcs could never round up all that valuable armor themselves.

I see. No wonder you're upset.

Do you know where to find them?
(He doesn't have a plan at all.)

I would like to accept the offer you presented last night. We will hereby serve under you.

Shion, it's time to switch places.

@exp Benimaru.Cool.Idle:Great Rimuru, do you have a moment? I have a private request...

@exp Benimaru.Sad.Exclusive_1:Due to my position, I find myself leading troops all the time. I don't mind fighting myself, but there's another skill I lack...
That is why I would like to ask you, Great Rimuru, to teach me how to move forces around.
I get it. You want to learn strategy and tactics. No problem! Let's go eradicate some magical beasts together first.
@exp Benimaru.Grin.Exclusive_1: There's talk of getting the boys together for some drinks. Any interest, Great Rimuru?
A guys' night out! Lemme know when you do that, I'm definitely game!
@exp Benimaru.Smile.Exclusive_1: This town still has a way to go. I'll keep busy, too.
That's all of 'em. Well? Satisfied now?
@exp Kaijin.Normal.Sad:I hate to admit it, but these are on par with the one I made with my own hands. How could I ever thank you?
@exp Kaijin.Normal.Proposal:Once I've made my delivery, would you join me for a drink?
We've got a lot to talk about, so let's relax over drinks.
Oh, Kaijin! How nice to see you!
Wow! An Elf! They are real! Or did I die and go to heaven?!
I made my delivery on time, thanks to you! Consider this my gift!
Something worth celebrating? Well, come on. Let's drink!
Haha, that sure threw me for a loop! I busted my ass to make that sword, and you made all those copies in seconds!
Only because the original you made was so incredible. All I did was analyze and copy it. Was I out of line?
If I'm being honest, it is a little vexing. But next time, I'll make one so amazing that even you won't be able to copy it! I relish the challenge!
I can't, but any drink is delicious if a pretty lady pours it for me!
Hey, Mr. Slime! Would you like to try this?
Th-This? C-Could this be the nighttime legend I've heard about?!
I'm very good at it. Everyone says I'm pretty amazing, in fact.
Um, miss? What exactly are you amazing at? *gulp*
Oh, you meant fortunetelling. Ahaha... So what kind of readings can you do?
How about the person he's destined to be with?
Oh, good idea! Okay, here I go.
What?! The person I'm destined to be with... Could someone like that really be in this world?
Maybe it's actually a slime I'm destined to be with.
@exp Vesta.Surprise.Exclusive_1:How do you come up with so many groundbreaking new ideas, Great Rimuru?
Well, I just... They just come to me, Vesta!
@exp Rigurd.Smile.Idle: I never get tired of looking at the gorgeous buildings of this town. Dwarven architecture is amazing!
@exp Soei.Normal.Exclusive_1: All is well today, too.
Well, Gobta? You won't get carried away like that again, will you?
Urgh, what a pain in the neck...
There you are! Gobta, what are you doing here? You were supposed to check in ages ago... Oh! Great Rimuru?!
Oh, Rigur! I see you're hard at work. Were you looking for Gobta?
Yes, he didn't check in on time, so I went looking for him... But I didn't expect to find him with you, Great Rimuru!
I've been giving Diablo a proper tour of the town. We ran into Gobta, so he came along to tell us all about his guard duties and so forth.
So that's it. Even so, Gobta, you should at least try not to be late reporting in.
It wasn't my fault! Great Rimuru sprung a practice match on me out of nowhere!
I'm sure it was your own fault somehow.
Honestly... Well then, please excuse me, Great Rimuru. I should report back.
Oh, are you going to report to Rigurd? In that case, we'll go with you. I'm taking Diablo to see him next.
Oh-ho, so you've been giving Diablo a proper tour?
Well then, hello again! I am Rigurd, and this is my son, Rigur. As you know, Great Rimuru has tasked me with managing our domestic affairs.
My usual duties are with the security force. Lately, I've been assisting my father at times, and taking on a more diplomatic role as well.
You already seem to have a pretty good working relationship.
Yes, our interactions with Diablo have been quite smooth. He's been a great help to my son and me.
Not at all. As Great Rimuru's secretary, it's the least I can do.
(Diablo even has Rigurd's approval, huh? He really is brilliant. They're hardly gonna need me anymore at this rate! Haha, no way...right?)
I greatly admire your tireless hard work as a leading administrator in this town, Rigurd.
Not at all. It's only because I used to be the elder of this village.
Now that so many people from different races have joined us, I'm just grateful to still be entrusted with such an important role.
Thinking back to how we met really takes me back...
Indeed. I was such a frail creature before you gave me a name, nothing at all like I am now.
Oh? I would never have guessed from your present form.
Yeah, it really surprised me then, too! When I woke up after naming him, he was like a totally different person...
It surprised me, as well, and I'm his son!
Oh, stop it, you two! Ahahaha!
I'm truly grateful to have received a name from Great Rimuru, not to mention a form like this!
I was so full of determination to protect this town myself, when I inherited my older brother's name from Great Rimuru!
There are plenty of folks around here now who are stronger than me, but I still intend to do whatever I can with all my might.
Right! Keep up the good work.
Benimaru thinks the world of you, too, so I'd appreciate it if you could keep on helping him whenever you can.
Oh, Rigur! Benimaru approves of you, as well? Ohhhhhhh!
Ack! Please, calm down! Great Rimuru is watching, you know!
Haha, looks like your father-son bond is still in great shape!
How marvelous, for father and son alike to have the absolute faith of Great Rimuru!
Come now, it's all thanks to Great Rimuru's favor!
Indeed, it's just as you say! Ah, I'd expect nothing less of him!
Quite right! Great Rimuru is a truly wonderful person!
(Why do I get the feeling this tour is just gonna keep derailing onto this topic?)
Great Rimuru, you look a bit down-hearted. Are you all right?
Oh, it's nothing serious. Don't worry about me, I'm fine.
(Rigur sure recovers his cool quickly. He really is a valuable guy to have around.)
By the way, Rigur, we're not taking up too much of your time, are we?
Oh, that's right. I should get back to my guard duties soon.
Ah, that reminds me. There's a little something I wanted your advice about, as well, regarding what's happening tonight.
Diablo, I'm sorry, but do you mind waiting for a little while?
It's no trouble at all. Your work must come first, Great Rimuru.
Um, in that case, would you like to join me on my guard duties?
I've heard about your great strength, and I'd like to see it for myself and learn what I can from you...
Certainly! Let us be off, Rigur.
Thank you so much! We'll be off on patrol, then.
So, you wanted to talk about tonight? ...Hang on.
Nothing. I just thought of something, that's all...
Ahaha, how convenient, encountering a magical beast so quickly after starting our rounds!
Yes, allow me to handle this, please.
I shall give this fight my all, to set the best example for you that I can.
I'd like to try growing some high- quality hipokute herbs, but I'm not sure how to get started...
I'm glad to see how motivated you are. Why not try talking to Vesta about it?
Shuna, I brought back the materials you asked for!
@exp Shuna.Smile.Idle:Oh, and all high-quality materials, too... I knew I could count on you, Great Rimuru.
Hehehe, it was a piece of cake! Let me know if you ever need anything else.
@exp Shuna.Grin.Exclusive_1:Really?! Thank you so much. I'll be sure to ask you again!
@exp RimuruDefault.None.Proposal: Got a moment, Vesta? I've been wondering—can you make this kind of magic circle?
@exp VestaDefault.Sad.Think: Ah yes... A magic circle that can strengthen earth attribute powers.
@exp RimuruDefault.None.Relax: Right. If you can do it, it would help those of us who use earth magic and skills. Wouldn't that be useful?
@exp VestaDefault.Smile.Bow: Leave it to me. I'll take the work I did previously and apply it to produce just the results you're looking for!
@exp RimuruDefault.Smile.Nod: Oh, nice! I knew I could count on you, Vesta! I can't wait to see it!
Amazing! You're the best, Master! One neatly filleted Megalodon!
A task simple enough to achieve before breakfast...or dinner, in this case.
It's so light...and so hard. I bet we could use this.
It could be a shield, too. Or we could even work it into some armor.
We could even make and export some simple accessories with it. They'd fetch a high price for sure.
Geld, that was some splendid fighting! Your courage set an example I'd like to follow!
You were unstoppable yourself, Gabiru! I can't express my admiration enough!
You were a big help, Milim. Thanks again.
It was nothing! It's only natural I'd do that much! Feel free to thank me more!
You were really something yourself, Rimuru! If you said you planned to become a Demon Lord, I'd have no objections!
A Demon Lord? You know I wouldn't become one of those. Is there any merit to being one?
Why did you become a Demon Lord?
Why did I? Did something bad happen and make me become one out of frustration?
Uh, why are you asking me?
Good point! I can't really remember! It was so long ago that I forgot!
Oh, yeah! I just thought of one merit!
It's because I became a Demon Lord that I found myself a bestie!
Anyway, bestie, I need to get back to work now.
Well, it doesn't mean I'll never see you again! We'll only be apart for a little while!
I'll be sure to tell the other Demon Lords not to mess with this place, so don't worry about that!
You're going to see the other Demon Lords?
Careful you don't let them trick you.
Please don't let them trick you.
Please don't let them trick you.
Make certain they do not trick you.
You all worry too much! They can't trick me! I'm too smart! Ahahahaha! Well, I'm off!
I envy how free-spirited she is.
That's so very like Lady Milim, though.
I look forward to seeing her again.
You gave the children flowers? Thank you.
@exp Trya.Smile.Exclusive_1:Teehee, no need to thank me, Great Rimuru. You're too kind.
@exp Trya.Smile.Exclusive_1:I made you a crown of flowers. If you'd like...
Oh, thank you! Hey... Don't tell me you're thinking of using me as a dress-up doll too, are you Trya?
@exp Rigurd.Smile.Exclusive_1:Great Rimuru! The town's at peace again today, thanks to you!
Ah, haha, it's not thanks to me. It's thanks to everyone!
You seem so relaxed when you talk with Kurobe, Great Rimuru.
Phew. Sorry that took so long, Trya. So as I was saying, we looked into things, and...
We decided that if we built a road leading to the place you taught us about where you harvest food, it would lead to overharvesting, and the food would run out in the blink of an eye.
And then we would be guilty of using up the forest's bounty. We want to continue living in harmony with the forest.
@exp Trya.Smile.Exclusive_1: This town is definitely safe with you around, Great Rimuru.
@exp Shion.Smile.Idle:Having a look around town, Great Rimuru?
@exp Benimaru.Smile.Idle:As the next leader of the Ogre clan, I'm glad I decided to follow you, Great Rimuru. I feel this way from the bottom of my heart.
@exp Benimaru.Cool.Exclusive_1:I plan on continuing to support you with all of my strength. Please take this in commemoration of this occasion.
Thanks. I have high hopes for your contributions in the future, too. But I have to say...it's embarrassing to hear you say that again!
@exp Gobta.Smile.Exclusive_1: Hehe... How do I look?
All right, we drove them all away. No harm no foul, right Souei?
@exp Soei.Smile.Idle:It was thanks to you and your power, Great Rimuru. Not a single one was able to approach the town.
@exp Soei.Cool.Exclusive_1:Still, they could come back at any time. I'd like to strengthen the guard in this area. Would that be acceptable?
(He's already thinking about what has to happen next. Man, things are so much easier when your subordinates are this competent. An absolute breeze.)
@exp Shion.Smile.Idle:Great Rimuru, I'm very grateful to have met you. So I wanted to show my appreciation once more.
@exp Shion.Grin.Exclusive_1:This gift...represents all of my feelings. Please, take it.
Thanks, Shion. I appreciate it, along with all of your feelings.
Souei, I've heard that you're accepting jobs from everyone these days. Is that true?
@exp Soei.Normal.Exclusive_1:Yes. For instance, today I accepted several gathering jobs.
I'm happy to hear that you're working so hard for the town, but why are you taking it on yourself to do so much?
@exp Soei.Smile.Idle:When you went deep into the forest the other day, it made me realize that I need to learn more about this forest, too.
@exp Soei.None.Exclusive_1:The more I know, the more I can apply it to strengthening the town's guard.
I see... That makes sense. So let's split up the work, Souei. I'll investigate the forest while gathering materials!
@exp Shuna.Grin.Exclusive_1:Being able to help out like this is a dream come true. I'm so glad I met you, Great Rimuru.
You're making me blush... You are always such a great help.
@exp Milim.Grin.Exclusive_1: There are so many people! How fun! You've done good, Rimuru my bestie!
Great Rimuru! The storeroom is full thanks to everyone's hard work! I've brought everything I thought you might possibly need!
Whoa... How did you defeat them so easily?!
Didn't I tell you? See, you're safe with me. Anyway, fortify the village's defenses and make sure no one else gets hurt.
Once the defenses are solid, I'll be able to fight without worrying about the village, too.
Everyone! Listen to Great Rimuru! Hurry up and build that defensive fence!
Hmph, looks like the village's defenses are okay now... Now all we have to do is wait for their attack.
Hey, Gabiru. Did your spear return to normal?
I thought so. All right, let's go hunting for magical beasts, Gabiru! I'll go with you, so wield that spear to your heart's content!
@exp Milim.Shy.Exclusive_1: Mmm, honey sure is delicious! I love it!
@exp Milim.Smile.Exclusive_1: I just don't feel like destroying this town, you know?
@exp Shuna.Sad.Exclusive_1:I'm not very useful in a fight. You'll still keep me on as your servant though, right?

@exp Shion.Smile.Idle:Great Rimuru, Great Rimuru! This is a special day for you, isn't it?

@exp Shion.Grin.Exclusive_1:No, it's definitely something to get all that excited about! Here, Great Rimuru! A little present, representing all my feelings!
@exp Kurobei.Puzzle.Idle:Hmm. As I thought. Looks like there's still plenty of room for improvement.
Really? I thought it was already amazing enough.
@exp Kurobei.Angry.Exclusive_1:Oh no, not at all. In fact, if I were to expect you to use this, it'd still be less than halfway to completion.

@exp Kurobei.Smile.Idle:Oh, I wouldn't go that far... Anyway, thank you once again for your help, Great Rimuru!
@exp Gobta.Sad.Idle: This doesn't look right on me...

@exp Trya.Shy.Exclusive_1: It's become such a lovely town!
@exp Gobta.Smile.Idle:Hello, Great Rimuru! Do you need this?
You're not just trying to get rid of things you don't need, are you? Heh, I'll take it either way.

Pardon me for asking, Great Rimuru, but are you a man? Or are you...?
That's...highly confidential. I'm just me, all right!
Why is it that, right after I said that, we ended up going into the forest to hunt magical beasts?
Aw, man! You're always so cool! Diablo, I'll bet you could wipe out every magical beast in the area on your own, couldn't you?!
So, planning to leave it all up to him and take it easy yourself, huh?
Urk! N-No way, I would never! C'mon, Great Rimuru!
Hmm...if those were your orders, Great Rimuru, I would not object...
Leaving everything in the hands of the most powerful...that's not what I want for this town.
What a shame... I hoped I could be of use to you, Great Rimuru.
You sure are weird, Diablo... If it was me, I'd never ask for more work like that!
You really are completely feckless, aren't you, Gobta?
Hehe, compliments won't get you anywhere with me!
Uh, I'm not complimenting you. I'm getting fed up with you.
Look, Gobta, for now, your job is to keep patrolling around the town and hunting any magical beasts you find.
Keeping the peace in town is an important duty!
I see. So, you are mainly in charge of the Goblin Riders, then?
Yeah, but don't worry, the rest of them are way more serious than him.
Hey, I'm real serious about doing the work you trust me with!
Oh, like when you skipped out on training with Hakurou again yesterday?
That's got nothing to do with this!
Hmm, I see your relationship with one another is quite informal.
Huh? Well, how should I put this... We've known each other a long time.
Aww, that takes me back! I still remember when you first showed up, Great Rimuru. You looked just like a regular old slime, but you were so, so scary...

What did you expect after you let fly with all those magicules?
W-Well, I'd just arrived in the woods, and I had a lot on my mind...
(I had no idea what I was doing, but I'm not gonna admit that now!)
Ahaha, I'm quite envious, Gobta. I only wish I'd happened to be there myself!
Hehe, knowing Great Rimuru so well is one of the benefits of us being his friends from the start!
He trusts me more than anyone, too! He takes me with him almost everywhere he goes, after all!
Then again, he did leave me all alone in that jail in Dwargon...
Hahaha, that's because I knew you'd be all right! I'd never forget you, never.
Great Rimuru certainly seems to have the utmost faith in you! What is the secret to earning his trust? I should very much like to hear it.
Well, when Great Rimuru is like, BAM, you gotta be right there like, BOOM, and send it right back at him like, BOING! Kinda like that, yeah?
(Wow, you actually baffled Diablo. You really are something else, Gobta.)
Anyway, in the end, I think it's ‘cause we've known each other for so long.
Oh, Great Rimuru! Why could you not have summoned me sooner?!
If only you had, I would have had a much closer view of all your mighty deeds...
Look, don't be ridiculous... I didn't even learn to summon demons until pretty recently.
Hey...the way you said that made it sound like you've been watching me from somewhere since before I summoned you... You haven't, right?
Quit laughing and answer me! You're creeping me out!
I don't really get it, but it seems like Diablo likes you a lot, huh?
I still don't get why he likes me so much, personally.
Of course he likes you! You're Great Rimuru, after all! You sure are lucky, to get to worry about people liking you too much...
Look, it's not as if I hate it, okay? If that's how he feels, then...fine.
Ahh, I truly envy your bond. As for me, I fear that I shall always be humbled before Great Rimuru.
Hey, people are always telling me to get my act together, too.
Right now, I see their point...
Anyway, I like this approach better than a bunch of humble bowing and scraping.
I'm so glad that's the kind of guy you are, Great Rimuru! You'd probably never have let me hang out with you, otherwise.
Ahaha! So that is what makes Great Rimuru so inimitably wonderful.
(It's not exactly a very deep conversation, but I still think I'd better keep my mouth shut.)
If you don't mind, Gobta, could you tell me more about Great Rimuru?
Sure thing! I know all sorts of stuff about Great Rimuru! I'll tell you whatever you want!
Hey, are you sure you've got time for that? You're still supposed to be in the middle of guard duty!
No worries! If I tell 'em you told me to talk to him about stuff, nobody will dare complain!
(Is it just me, or does it feel like he's just coming up with an excuse to goof off?)
Oh, wait, is there anything you don't want me to mention? If there is, I might be persuadable, depending on your terms...
(Yeah, this is getting out of hand. It looks like I'd better nip it in the bud, and quick.)
Diablo, I know you just got done fighting for me, but do you have the strength for another battle?
Okay, Gobta, you can make up for skipping training with Hakurou yesterday with a practice match now. Diablo can be your opponent.
He's pretty strong, but you've been practicing with Hakurou, so you should be fine, yeah?
Don't hold back, Diablo. Put him through his paces for me.
All right, you two. Ready...set... Go!
I'd like to apologize properly to Lady Milim for treating her like just a kid, but I'm not sure how...
All right, I'll get you some candy to give her... But honestly, I'm pretty sure she's already forgotten the whole thing.
@exp Soei.Smile.Exclusive_1: He's nice to people as well as to monsters. What an unusual man he is.
Hey, what should I bring as gifts when I visit another country?
@exp Vesta.Smile.Exclusive_1:Whatever the people of that other country show interest in. In this case, I would say take healing elixirs, or weapons forged by Kaijin and his associates...
@exp Rigurd.Smile.idle: Things are peaceful again in town today... It's a good thing...
@exp Vesta.Normal.Exclusive_1:If I'm ever allowed to enter Dwargon again, I will have to make my apologies to the Butterflies of the Night, too.
I'll go with you when you do. Not to enjoy the butterflies, mind you.
@exp Vesta.Normal.Idle:Thank you for always supporting our research.
@exp Vesta.Normal.Exclusive_1:I wanted to show you our appreciation in the form of this small gift... Please, will you accept it?
You're a clan patriarch yourself. I would appreciate any advice you could give me from time to time on running this town.
@exp Benimaru.Normal.Exclusive_1:I'm just in awe of your leadership over the town, to be honest. I've never seen such peace and tranquility before.
@exp Benimaru.Normal.Idle: I must not overlook even the smallest problem, so that Great Rimuru can live in this town in peace!
It's kinda annoying... Maybe I'll just burn all the stuffed animals up.
Notice: The probability that the individual Alice Rondo would cry is...100%.
Maybe not, then. Guess I'll just wrap them up in Sticky Threads, instead. Oh, some of their fur is frayed. I'll do a little repair work too while I'm at it...
Hmm... Doesn't look like the energy in their bodies has been reduced at all. Damn, it didn't work. Guess I can't prevent their destruction after all...
Another option might be to separate it from them with Degenerate...
Answer: The energy has fused with their souls and cannot be separated from them.
Figures. They don't have much time, but I'll just have to search for another way.
Okay, eyes on me! As you have just learned through experience, I am strong!
And as such, I promise to save all of you.
Yeah. I swear it on this mask.
It is. When Miss Shizu entrusted this to me, I believe she also entrusted me with all of you!
I trusted you from the beginning.
Jeez, you guys... Fine. I will, too.
You're right, Kenya. I think we can trust this person, too.
(Wait... Shizu came to this world around the same time these kids did, right?)
(How did she survive that long? She said the Demon Lord Leon made Ifrit possess her...)
I'll save you, no matter what. So trust me, and be good kids, all right? Shizu entrusted you to me, and I won't abandon you!
Teacher, huh? I like the sound of that.
@exp Benimaru.Puzzle.Exclusive_1: Whenever I run into Shuna these days, she always makes me try on clothes. I think I've finally experienced a small taste of your suffering, Great Rimuru.
Everyone's stronger now that I named you, but there are still lots of magical beasts lurking around this forest, right?
Yes. But now that we've received your protection, Great Rimuru, I don't think it will be much of a problem...
We still need to be careful. Besides, we'll need a security force if we want this place to grow.
@exp RimuruSlimeDefault.None.Joy:All right, let's make a training ground. I'll fight if it comes to that, but I'd still like to see everyone improve their skills, just in case.
Yes, sir! I'll begin preparations right away!
@exp Gabiru.Angry.Exclusive_1: I have to learn from Geld's fighting style...
@exp Ranga.Smile.Idle:Master, while prowling the forest, I sniffed out this thing. May you find it useful.
Oh, this is great. Thanks Ranga, your nose is amazing!
@exp RimuruDefault.None.Exclusive_1: Vesta, I hear your research work has resulted in a new technique.
@exp RimuruDefault.None.Think: Some kind of special magic circle connected to the attribute of darkness?
@exp VestaDefault.Smile.Bow: Exactly. By setting up this magic circle, it is possible to increase the power of someone skilled in the dark attribute.
@exp VestaDefault.None.Exclusive_1: I can create one right away just as soon as you give me your permission, Great Rimuru.
@exp RimuruDefault.Smile.Angry: Of course you can make one! I'm counting on you, Vesta.
@exp Geld.Normal.Idle:Great Rimuru, I have bad news. Apparently the magical beast you disposed of had a friend...
@exp Geld.Normal.Idle:We've been getting reports of it causing havoc along the roadway. It may start doing damage if it is not stopped.
Well, we can't let that happen. I'll take care of it right away. Leave it to me.
@exp Geld.Normal.Exclusive_1:Thank you! I don't think there's anything to worry about, but please, be careful...
@exp Gabiru.Smile.Exclusive_1: This place is looking like a real town these days. I wonder if it will develop even further!
@exp Treyni.Smile.Exclusive_1:Pardon me once more, Great Rimuru. All of your town's food is so delicious!
Haha, it makes me happy to hear you say that! We take pride in our cooking here.
@exp Treyni.Puzzle.Idle:If I may be so bold, I was wondering if—
Ah! Something's happening in the forest!
@exp Treyni.angry.Exclusive_1:A magical beast is on a rampage... I have to go right away. I'm sorry, Great Rimuru, but we'll have to continue this discussion later.

@exp Gabiru.Surprise.Idle: Sometimes I can hear Gobta screaming all the way in the dining hall. I wonder what's going on...
@exp Gabiru.Smile.Exclusive_1: I'm giving my all to make sure this town grows, too!
@exp Shion.Smile.Idle: Hakurou said he would increase the difficulty of Gobta's training. I should ask Hakurou for a bout myself, it's been too long...
@exp Kurobei.Smile.Idle: Benimaru has a very strong sense of responsibility. Please try not to overwork him, Great Rimuru.
@exp Hakuro.Smile.Exclusive_1:Great Rimuru, I found something interesting. It would be wasted on me, so please take it.
@exp Benimaru.Smile.Idle: This place sure seems a lot more like a real town than it used to back at the beginning.
@exp Benimaru.Puzzle.Exclusive_1: I'd like to find some way to help out when there's no fighting going on, Great Rimuru...
Gabiru and Gobta were hanging out together just a moment ago. I wonder if they were slacking off.
@exp Vesta.Normal.Exclusive_1:Gabiru said something about hunting for magical beasts. Gobta might be helping him out.
@exp Rigurd.Smile.Exclusive_1: The nation of Tempest has grown large, thanks to the strength of Great Rimuru!
Great Rimuru... When do you think Soka will start looking up to me more?
Oh, so that's been bothering you...
@exp Gobta.Grin.Idle:I thought of yet another way to tell whether or not you're a slime, Great Rimuru!
You never give up, do you...?
@exp Gobta.Normal.Exclusive_1:If you're really a slime, you should be able to regenerate. And your Pain Nullification skill means that even if someone punches you, it wouldn't hurt, right?
So I'll punch you, and then you can show me how you regenerate! Let's do this!
@exp Hakuro.Smile.Exclusive_1:Thank you for letting me serve you, Great Rimuru. I mean that sincerely.

I heard you were the strongest in this town, so I came to introduce myself.

Ah, a look at the forge? I do find forges interesting. They're quite alien to me, since they're used to create, rather than to destroy.
Uhh, just ignore how ominous that sounded, okay? It does seem like he's interested, so could you give him a quick demonstration, please?

Thanks for explaining, Kaijin. That was a great presentation, Kurobe!
Naw, that was nothing special. A piece of cake!

Why, it was most interesting. I could hardly tear my gaze away! What fine skills!

Oho! Great Rimuru, you're so magnificent!

I can't wait! With your skills, I'll bet it won't be long before you make it happen!

Hey, Diablo, your aura is kind of...leaking? Calm down, all right?

It is my great hope to earn Great Rimuru's trust as quickly as I possibly can.

Ah, yes... I see... What?! Is that so?!

Oh, Great Rimuru! Whatever should I do?!

Notice: If you tell him that he should change, there is an extremely high probability that serious mayhem will occur.

Ahaha, if that is what you prefer, then certainly, Great Rimuru.

I'm the leader of the Jura Tempest Federation, the nation of monsters in the Forest of Jura.
That's right. You know who I am, don't you?

Who am I? I'm just a slime.
I recommend you change to slime form.
In slime form, you can enter the kingdom through the rainspouts on the castle walls.
The pipes for draining rainwater off of the roof.
What the—? Where'd she go?! We may have an intruder! Alert the main unit! Redouble the town guard!
Wow! What a beautiful city. The buildings are so tall. Do giants live here?
Answer: These buildings were designed to provide more living space within a limited area.
Answer: The price of land is determined by the area. Ownership is also a limitation here.
Area? So for example, that house over there... The area on which it sits is from here to here, right? So then the sky to the very very top right over the land belongs to the owner, too?
Umm... I don't really get it. Ah! That smell! I've never smelled it before. Whatever it is, it smells delicious!
Here you go. ...Heyyy! You have to pay for that.
Notice: You pay for the value of a doughnut with coins.
How about flowers picked in the woods?
No way, no how! Come back after your mommy gives you your allowance! Ah, you there! How about some freshly baked doughnuts?!
How come it has to be coins?
Answer: In human society, currency is a medium of exchange for many things. Between donuts and wild flowers, the value of doughnuts is the higher of the two in terms of currency.
It is not something a specific person decided.
Notice: There is a mirror within the equipment store to the right.
No, I want to learn more! There's too much I don't know! Great Sage, is there anywhere nearby where I could study?
Answer: There is a library. You can peruse all manner of information there.
Lucky me! Let's head over there!
Ah, young lady, do you have an entrance pass?
Oh, dear... You can't enter without one.
You have to buy it. Do you have any money?
That again?! So I exchange money for a pass, and then with the pass, I can read a book?
Wait a second. Once I finish reading the book, my money and pass will both be gone? That's not an exchange.
Answer: In human society, monetary value is also placed on information and services.
Whaaat?! Even formless things like that?! Who decides the price? And how?!
Wh-What's gotten into this kid? Just go ask your mommy to buy you a pass!
So I gotta get money from Mother in order to study, too? Then I guess it's about time to go home. The closest mirror is—
Over here, over here! Surround her, everyone!
Huh?! What's going on?! Is something here?!
Yeah, you! You're the intruder the gate guard was talking about! Your human mimicry is flawless, but you can't fool us! Now come quietly or else!
Wait a second! I didn't do anything wrong!
We can't very well wait until you do, now can we?!
So, you refuse to come along peacefully? Then we've no choice. We'll take you by force!
@exp Cynthia.Shout.Angry:Don't attack me just because of some delusional victimhood!
@exp Hakuro.Bitter.Exclusive_1: Wearing this and drawing my sword... Oh yeah, I can call this part of my training.
@exp Benimaru.Smile.Exclusive_1: Who knew the town would grow to such a size... Well, of course it did, knowing you Great Rimuru.

To think, a day would come when you'd say that to me! I'm glad I met you too, Gobta. Thank you for all that you do!
@exp Kurobei.Sad.Idle:Great Rimuru, I'm sorry to always be asking for your assistance, but there's something else I need...
It's fine. I heard you had a lot more stuff to research, so I figured you'd need more help. What would you like me to bring back this time?
@exp Kurobei.Angry.Exclusive_1:Oh no, it's not that. I'd like you to test out a prototype for me. Let's go hunt magical beasts together.
Oh, so it's a field test this time. I'd be glad to. I want to see how your new weapons perform for myself,  too!
@exp Kurobei.Smile.Idle:I appreciate it! Then let's do it!
@exp Benimaru.Smile.Idle: Gobta's skills are pretty interesting. I bet he'll make a good training partner at some point.
Answer: Equipment of target {0} {1} for {2} individual can level up.
@exp Rigurd.Grin.Exclusive_1: There aren't many towns as amazing as this one. It's all thanks to your wisdom, Great Rimuru!
@exp Vesta.Normal.Exclusive_1:Great Rimuru, do you have a moment? I'd like to report on the status of my research...
Oh, sorry but I have something I need to take care of. Can we do that later?
@exp Rigurd.Cool.Idle: The town's starting to prosper, but we need to ensure that it develops much further than this.
Good job, Gobta! As promised, I'll have Kurobe make you a weapon.
As for all of you, Gobta has won this battle! Got any problem with that? I admit, I didn't think you could do it...
If you want us to help you fight the Orcs, we'll consider it, but we won't serve you. Take him and leave for today.
Sheesh... I guess we'd better plan where to go from here, too.
I saw 200,000 Orcs. The main army is moving north along the river...
Based on the movements of this army and a detached force, I expect they will regroup in the marshlands east of here.
In the Lizardmen's territory, you mean?
Two hundred thousand, huh? Just what is it the Orcs are after?
Hmph... Orcs are not very intelligent monsters.
If there's something behind this invasion other than just instinct, we should suspect there's someone backing them.
Like a Demon Lord, perhaps? If that Gelmud guy who came to your village is involved in this...
I don't know if a Demon Lord is involved, but...
I think this makes it much more likely that an Orc Lord has appeared.
The unique monster that only appears once every few centuries?
Yes. I can't imagine an ordinary Orc leading an army of 200,000.
I believe caution would be wiser than optimism in this case.
One of the body doubles I had scouting the area has made an encounter. They request an audience with you. How shall I respond?
Who is it? I already had my fill of Gabiru, so I'd rather not meet anyone weird.
I don't believe this one is... weird... But it is a highly unusual encounter. It's...a Dryad.
A Dryad?! Aren't those the girls you see in a lot of games who are, like, tree spirits?
A...game? I don't know what that is, but hasn't it been several decades since the last time a Dryad showed itself?
Ruler of monsters, and all those who are loyal to him, forgive me for this unannounced visit. I am Treyni, a Dryad. It is a pleasure to meet you.
Oh, uh...I'm Rimuru Tempest...um, Treyni. So what brings you here?
I have come to request a favor.
Rimuru Tempest, ruler of monsters, I would like you to defeat the Orc Lord.
@exp Milim.Angry.Idle:Ah, there's nothing to do! Rimuru! I knew hanging around in a town all the time would grow old!
So I'll have to come up with some way to pass the time! You'll help out of course, right my bestie?
All right. Can't have you go running amok in town, after all... But all I have on my plate right now is requests to deal with monsters, is that okay?
@exp Milim.Smile.Exclusive_1:Oh-ho, anything with enough bite for me to have some fun with?
Won't know until we go find 'em. Just keep in mind... No overdoin' it, okay?
What did this town look like back when you first started building it, Great Rimuru?
Answer: Facility construction possible. Construction of facility recommended.
I brought back the ingredients you asked for, and we made a dish for you. How's this, Treyni?
@exp Treyni.Grin.Exclusive_1:In a word, wonderful! You're a good cook too, Great Rimuru!
Oh, I didn't do the actual cooking. That was Shuna and her team. When it comes to anything complicated, it's best to just leave it to them.
@exp Treyni.Shy.Idle:Oh, I see. I'll have to go thank them later!
@exp Treyni.Grin.Exclusive_1:Anyway... *gulp* Mmm... It really is delicious.
@exp Shion.Smile.Idle:Ah, Great Rimuru. I was just looking for you.
@exp Shion.Grin.Idle:I have something I want to give you, Great Rimuru. Here, please take this.
@exp Kaijin.Smile.Exclusive_1: I could use some exercise. Maybe I'll go chop wood.

@exp Soei.Cool.Idle:Great Rimuru, I wanted to talk to you about something.
@exp Soei.Angry.Exclusive_1:My Body Double found a magical beast that I'd never seen before. I'm going to verify and, if necessary, slay the beast.

@exp Ranga.Grin.Exclusive_1: Nothing gives me more joy than to run around the battlefield with my master on my back!

@exp Gabiru.Angry.Idle:Defeat magical beasts! In order to show my spear that I am a warrior worthy of wielding it!
(Well, a lot of magical beasts have been seen recently, so I would appreciate the help. And it is unfortunate that you've lost your strength due to your weakened spear power...)
All right. You can do it. But I'll tag along just in case something bad happens. All right?
Almost time to polish my blade again...
Hey Kaijin, is there some kind of improvement you'd like to make to your forge?
@exp Kaijin.Normal.Idle:No, I'm satisfied for the moment... but if I think of something, I won't hesitate to come and talk to you.
